... So the next morning we head to breakfast and we see bell hooks sitting with her friends at a table. I say hello, we chat briefly, and she sees my infant son. And then she asks if she could hold him, and I say sure and so we sit and chat...

...with her head in her hands and says,"You mean you just met bell hooks, helped her with her luggage, and YOU DO NOT KNOW WHO SHE IS!!?!" (Our friends would later confirm that I am a huge idiot for not knowing bell hooks - a loss I am deservedly taking)...

...I said to Jennifer, "Do you know who bell hooks is?" She said, "Of course, I know bell hooks. EVERYONE knows bell hooks. She's the keynote speaker." I said, "She's was one of the people I just helped with their luggage." Jennifer proceeds to sit on the floor...

So a quick bell hooks story:

I was travelling with Jennifer and our infant son to a NWSA conference in Puerto Rico in Nov of 2014. I was in the hallway right outside our hotel room and I passed two women struggling with their suitcases. I offered to help, they declined...
